Features.PlayerPins.Dialogue.Title: Customise Player Pins
Features.PlayerPins.Dialogue.lblToggleSw: Whether to change your own player pin, or the pin that shows for other server members.
Features.PlayerPins.Dialogue.lblRed.Hove: The Red channel of the pin colour.
Features.PlayerPins.Dialogue.lblGreen.Ho: The Green channel of the pin colour.
Features.PlayerPins.Dialogue.lblBlue.Hov: The Blue channel of the pin colour.
The opacity of the pin colour.
Features.PlayerPins.Dialogue.lblScale.Ho: The scale adjustment to apply to the pin scale.
Features.PlayerPins.Highlight.Descriptio: Add/Remove players from your highlighted players list.
Features.PlayerPins.Highlight.PlayerNotF: No player with the name `{0}` has been found.
Features.PlayerPins.Highlight.MultiplePl: Multiple players with the name `{0}` have been found.
Features.PlayerPins.Highlight.PlayerAlre: {0} has already been added to your highlighted players list.
Features.PlayerPins.Highlight.PlayerAdde: {0} has been added to your highlighted players list.
Features.PlayerPins.Highlight.PlayerRemo: {0} has been removed from your highlighted players list.
